title: 202511.IMK - Inflation Trends in Germany: Insights from the IMK Policy Brief
description: This episode explores the recent inflation developments in Germany, including declining energy prices, persistent service costs, and the impact on households across different income levels. We also discuss the European Central Bank's monetary policy stance and its implications for the German economy and consumers. Tune in for an in-depth analysis of current price dynamics and future outlooks.. Find PDF here: https://github.com/SimonRess/Podcasts/blob/main/literature/004 - Inflation Trends in Germany.
